PHRASE.LANG: Hey Sammy, nice to see ya. Aww, look at that big bushy tail waving in the air! Are you glad to see me? Wait a minute…. PEEE-EUW! That is some smelly skunk stink right there. You're still cute though, so it's okay. [#Legal]

Salut Sammy, content de te voir. Ouah, regarde cette grande queue touffue qui s'agite ! Tu es content de me voir ? Attends… BEURK ! Voilà une odeur de sconse bien nauséabonde. Mais tu es mignon, alors on te pardonne. [#Legal]

Hey Sammy, schön dich zu sehen. Ui, was für einen großen buschigen Schwanz du da hast! Freust du dich auch, mich zu sehen? Moment mal ... I-GITT! Mein Gott, stinkst du! Na ja, ist schon okay, du bist trotzdem süß. [#Legal]

Ehi Sammy, felice di vederti. Aww, guarda quella coda pelosa che scodinzola nell'aria! Ti fa piacere vedermi? Aspetta un attimo…. PEEE-EUW! Sento proprio odore di moffetta puzzolente qui. Nonostante tutto sei graziosa, perciò tutto ok. [#Legal]
¡Hombre, Mauro! ¡Pero cuánto tiempo sin verte! ¿Mueves la cola porque te alegras de verme? Yo también estoy… ¡Puaj, qué peste! Bueno, vale, te lo perdono porque somos amigos… [#Legal]
サミー君にうかつに近づくと危険。しかしそんなリスクがあろうと近づきたくなるのがサミー君です。 \n※このアイテムはポータブルアイテムです。 [#Legal]
헤이 새미, 만나서 반가워. 와우, 그 커다란 털복숭이 꼬리를 흔들어 대는 걸 봐! 나를 보니까 반가워? 잠시만…. 피-유! 정말 고약한 스컹크 냄새구나. 그래도 귀여우니까, 괜찮아. [#Legal]

Hey Sammy, nice to see ya. Aww, look at that big bushy tail waving in the air! Are you glad to see me? Wait a minute…. PEEE-EUW! That is some smelly skunk stink right there. You're still cute though, so it's okay. [#Legal]
嘿，薩米，很高興見到你。 瞧牠那毛茸茸的大尾巴搖擺的樣子！你好可愛喔～等一下…噁 ! 牠又放臭屁了。不過你超可愛的，所以沒關係啦。 [#Legal]
嘿，薩米，很高興見到你。 瞧牠那毛茸茸的大尾巴搖擺的樣子！你好可愛喔～等一下…噁 ! 牠又放臭屁了。不過你超可愛的，所以沒關係啦。 [#Legal]

Hey Sammy, nice to see ya. Aww, look at that big bushy tail waving in the air! Are you glad to see me? Wait a minute…. PEEE-EUW! That is some smelly skunk stink right there. You're still cute though, so it's okay. [#Legal]
